video.title: Granite Flats
video.synopsis: Young Arthur and his mother arrive in a small town that quickly becomes a hotbed of mysteries that the boy and his new friends try to solve.

episodes.synopsis: When a mysterious object falls from the sky and an Army base explodes, three young amateur sleuths try to unveil the secrets of their small town.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Fear spreads in the wake of the explosion, and the kids try to find the culprit; something strange is going on with one of the hospital patients.
episodes.title: Empty Box

episodes.synopsis: The kids begin investigating the town's mysteries; John and Slim receive an ultimatum; the police chief focuses on one suspect in the base explosion.
episodes.title: A Secret to the Heart Nearest

episodes.synopsis: An inquisitive visitor comes to town; Beth tries to connect with her son and starts her own investigation; John pushes matters at the hospital.
episodes.title: Talking

episodes.synopsis: A school project challenges the trio's friendship; doctors run strange tests on Frank; Wallace enjoys a victory; Madeline asks her parents for help.
episodes.title: Bonds

episodes.synopsis: John gets a new partner; Wallace's loyalties are tested; things become confusing between Beth and Frank; the trio proves themselves as detectives.
episodes.title: Reassembly

episodes.synopsis: The young detectives have a new mystery to solve; Slim's secret alliance takes a turn; Hershel faces the death penalty; Frank makes a bold confession.
episodes.title: The Wrong Man

episodes.synopsis: The trio's sleuthing reputation grows; the FBI returns; John takes a big risk trying to free Hershel; the science fair brings shocking discoveries.
episodes.title: Something Dangerous

episodes.synopsis: John and Ezekiel hunt for a KGB mole; the young detectives investigate a haunting; the Andrews' take Frank somewhere; Whittison turns to Beth.
episodes.title: Children of Darkness, Children of Light

episodes.synopsis: Ezekiel and John's investigation gets complicated; Hershel and Regina have problems; the detectives try to stay ahead of the FBI investigation.
episodes.title: Boundaries

episodes.synopsis: The hospital is under siege; the detectives put themselves in harm's way; Frank picks a fight; Whittison makes a dangerous discovery.
episodes.title: From Whose Bourn No Traveler Returns

episodes.synopsis: The FBI does some necessary clean up; people look back on how things used to be; Madeline has an epiphany; June and John are in trouble.
episodes.title: Also Be the Consolation

episodes.synopsis: The kids get a new teacher who knows a lot about secrets; an unwelcome visitor arrives; dinner at Whittison's takes a turn; Hershel gets a proposal.
episodes.title: Put Away Childish Things

episodes.synopsis: Ashmead intrudes on MKUltra; Frank and Beth create a subterfuge; Timmy turns to Hargraves for help; Arthur runs a scam; John brings Hershel in.
episodes.title: The Stories We Tell…

episodes.synopsis: John makes a midnight visit; the detectives' investigations go in different directions; Hershel takes a big risk; Beth is forced to make hard choices.
episodes.title: Cor Unum, Corambis

episodes.synopsis: Timmy and Madeline launch an illegal operation; the doctors have a new patient; Arthur proves a point; things take a turn for Regina and Wallace.
episodes.title: Project Madman

episodes.synopsis: When Madeline's parents find out about the stolen files, they forbid her to see Timmy; Arthur experiences major upheaval in his life.
episodes.title: Our Rendezvous Is Fitly Appointed

episodes.synopsis: The FBI and CIA move closer to learning the Plumber's identity; Arthur continues his secret training with Dr. Whittison.
episodes.title: The Converging Objects of the Universe Perpetually Flow

episodes.synopsis: While Frank spends the day with an old friend, Scottie tries to persuade June that Timmy and Madeline should be allowed to see each other.
episodes.title: Mortised in Granite

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Whittison gives Frank a serum that will protect him from mind control when the Andrews interrogate him; Wallace gets a major shock.
episodes.title: Form and Union and Plan

episodes.synopsis: While on a date with Dr. Whittison, Alice reveals that she has visions that sometimes come true; the Andrews investigate a possible KGB mole.
episodes.title: The Threads That Were Spun Are Gathered

episodes.synopsis: The FBI investigates professor Hargraves, while John suspects Scottie; Arthur makes a discovery that could shed light on Frank's missing memories.
episodes.title: Some Intricate Purpose

episodes.synopsis: Professor Hargraves makes a bold move to prove he's innocent; Madeline goes to her mother for help; Frank tries to recover his missing memories.
episodes.title: The Terrible Doubt of Appearances

episodes.synopsis: Timmy concocts a plan involving the FBI, the CIA and professor Hargraves, and the truth about Beth's death finally comes to light.
episodes.title: All Truths Wait in All Things
